text:
Take your knowledge further with a Flood and Coastal Engineering MSc. 

Scholarships are available, full time for one year starting in September 2021 and will include a 3 month work placement at the @EnvAgency (subject to terms and conditions).

Apply now: https://t.co/cStzUAbhhi https://t.co/VzuNvXZ5kR

#Flooding affects millions worldwide and the future needs more engineers. 

Join @BrunelUni and @EnvAgency on Friday 11 Dec 10am BST to hear what it‚Äôs like to study a sponsored degree in Flood and Coastal Engineering and ask questions.  

Register now: https://t.co/SCyzVeQUb8 https://t.co/NHBYQceDjr

urls.title: Creating a universal language for community-driven water management.
urls.description: WaterUp will produce language-neutral, digitally-enabled educational materials on the use of traditionally engineered, community-driven water management techniques to catalyse landscape restoration and livelihood improvement in support of the UN Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) #6: Clean water and sanitation for all.
